website_summaries.verdict: If oil control is your top priority in a mineral makeup, this one is worth considering; but it's not practical for all skin types or tones.
pros: Garners praise for offering light to full coverage, depending on how you prefer to layer it
It also offers ingredients like silica that helps control oil
cons: Can be "cakey" or heavy if you apply too much
A bit drying for users who don't have oily skin
Some shades have too much pink

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a product and color that works with my complexion (64, good skin with some wrinkles and minimal sun damage, but holding my own against the onslaught of aging fairly well). This is perfect. I hate foundation and seldom wear it, although I will occasionally (special occasions) mix foundation with my moisturizer to make a custom tinted moisturizer. I prefer a mineral powder to liquid foundation and have been looking for something that is very light weight on the skin, yet provides good medium coverage for any time of day. I really love this powder and plan to be using it for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: SQue

customer_reviews.title: This is my fourth container!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best mineral foundations I have used. It is light, yet gives great coverage. If you want even fuller coverage, apply one layer, wait a few minutes, and then go in an apply another layer. It's very buildable and does not get cakey unless you REEAALLY pack it on. Didn't break me out so it is great for sensitive skin!! I have veeery fair skin, and the porcelain matched my neck but the color 'light' was a true fit to my face tone color. Doesn't run orange or oxidize. Highly recommend and is a decent price for a higher end product!
customer_reviews.author: Addie McClure

customer_reviews.title: Product changed?
customer_reviews.text: The product on right is almost a year old, left a couple weeks! This product formula is different or defective I have been using for years. The pressed compact powder is loose and half the product is gone in less then a month and just not as smooth..I am contacting Pur directly. I hope this was a bad lot if not I will have to find another product,ugh! I really liked the original. Unfortunately I can not get a refund from Amazon because of over thirty days. I ordered in July but didn't open until now. It is not just about the money, finding make up we like is not easy and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not cake, great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I pair this with the Pur Minerals Hydrafluid Water Serum Foundation when I want extra coverage. Doe's not irritate my skin, and blends in well with no caking, and not to mention I have severe dry skin, so this is just amazing to find a powder that actually works for my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Fangs

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: This makeup is amazing. Once I got to a certain age, I could no longer wear powder foundation...or so I thought. Then I saw this presented on a shopping channel and thought I’d give it a try. Figuring out the color I’d need was just a wild guess, but the Blush Medium works perfectly for me. This foundation does not settle into my pores or fine lines and still looks great at the of the day. I have extremely sensitive skin and rosacea, but I haven’t had any breakouts or issues using this product. All in all, I couldn’t be any happier with how well this foundation works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.T

customer_reviews.title: Hives
customer_reviews.text: I too was a long, loyal customer of Bare Minerals then they sold off the company and the products were just not the same quality. I then found Pur Minerals to be a relatively good replacement except for the heavy compact with disappointing supply of product, then they too sold the company and product quality suffered. Very sad indeed when we find a great product and big business changes the Ingredients and we only find out when our skin suffers or we break out in hives as I did both times!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mineral powder. I have very sensitive/reactive/breakout prone Ginger skin and this stuff actually helps my skin. I have a very hard time finding cosmetics to work with my skin, but when I started getting adult acne from hormones I needed something with some coverage, but not a bunch of bad ingredients. I have tried everything you can probably name and so far this is the best. I have no intentions of changing. The price sucks, but if it helps my skin and works like it does I will pay it! I am a slightly fair, freckled, red head and the light is perfect, the porcelain was way too light.
customer_reviews.author: NaturalGinger

customer_reviews.title: Best Foundation I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and liquid foundations just slide off the oily parts of my face or disappear with sweat. I live in central Texas, sweat is a year-round makeup issue. This powder goes on lightly, evens out my complexion, and stays on all day even on 100+ degree days. Ordering it from Amazon keeps me from walking into Ulta and spending way more than I planned to AND it's delivered to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Drugstore knock-off
customer_reviews.text: The second I used this I could tell there was something wrong. It flaked very badly every time I loaded my brush. It did not feel the same, smell the same, or look the same. The pallet kept spinning which made it pretty obvious the real pallet had been removed and it had been replaced with a cheap knock-off from the dollar store. Beyond dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PUR powder makeup foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same PUR powder foundation that I have purchased from cosmetic departments. This powder is looser in consistency, and when brushed it becomes loose in the compact as finishing powder. On the face, the foundation is thicker when applied, crumbly. Other compacts purchased, the foundation was tightly compressed and when brushed to apply the only loose powder, if any, was on the brush to blow off before applying. Still in question, at this point, about this foundation powder's consistency. Compact came in a PUR box and the color is correct.
customer_reviews.author: notions

customer_reviews.title: Warning
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given a zero star rating if I could’ve. I believe this is fake product. The packaging is slightly different - the lettering on the compact is in caps whereas the wonderful stuff from Ulta is not. The dot pattern is also slightly different than the makeup I purchased at Ulta. Aside from asthetics, the makeup does not apply evenly and left streaks of powder. I went back to Ulta to repurchase (it is great, as usual) and I will never buy this stuff again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this twice before and been quite satisfied. This time, however, the make-up came cracked and broken apart. I understanding rough handling during handing, so I figured that the make-up would still work fine despite the cracks. I was wrong. It is more like a loose powder than pressed. It does not have the same consistency as before. It's very messy and does not have the same coverage. I will be going back to paying full price at Ulta I guess.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kavan

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite foundation powder; the texture is so fine and goes on beautifully! The “Light” is my color. My face gets pretty oily throughout the day, but if I spray finishing spray over it after I put it on, it doesn’t get very oily even toward the end of the day. Best part, looks great whether you like to apply with a brush or a poof. It’s a bit pricey and you don’t get very much, but if you don’t mind spending the money, fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Pür has really outdone themselves! The Pür 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup Foundation is great! The powder is really fine and goes on nicely without looking cakey. It gives a sheer to medium coverage while looking natural. If you have oily skin like me, you may want to use an oil free primer or setting spray. The best part about this is that it’s fragrance free and has SPF 15! Whenever is use this, it never makes me breakout! I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LSE587

customer_reviews.title: I've been using Pur for over 10 years now
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to foundation and concealer for over 10 years now. I agree with other reviewers that it seems like the formula has changed a bit (appears to be more dry) over the years. I battle psoriasis and this is the only foundation that works for me. I also used to suffer from cystic acne in my early 30's (fun... :/) and this makeup worked great for that too. It's easy to build coverage if needed. Hopefully, the company listens to its customers and goes back to the original formula. Until then (or until I find something similar) I'll keep using it. This is my 4th time buying it on Amazon too. Love the fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The ONE item you need in your makeup arsenal!
customer_reviews.text: I have lupus and my skin is am very sensitive to the sun. I have used Pur 4-in-1 for several years and have not been disappointed with the results. It goes on evenly and covers well (even dark spots and circles under my eyes). I know that the mineral formula is good for my skin. Pur 4-in-1 pressed powder takes the place of concealer, foundation, and sunscreen. It's affordable and well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: tygrtchr

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I am 54 years old and this powder sits in all of the creases/wrinkles on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This product seems a lot less firm (solid) than it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I am not as happy with this product as I have been in the past. It is the only "foundation" I use (plus the occasional "blush"). This product turns into a fine dust MUCH easier than it used to and gets all over the bathroom ( which is where I apply it). I think it is for that reason it doesn't go as far as it did in past years...It's gone before it should be. I still use the recommended brush to apply it, so that isn't the reason. Maybe the shipping method loosens it up too much???
customer_reviews.author: Meri A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this powder! I’ve been wearing Estee Lauder Double Wear powder for about 10 years an haven’t been able to find a suitable substitute because they never provide good coverage. This one does! And it’s not as drying as my EL powder so it looks more natural and hides fine lines rather than accenting them. I look younger and fresher. I have oily skin and this does good at not getting too oily but does allow for a little glow. That’s ok for me because I don’t get the over drying feel when first applied like I did with my Estée Lauder powder. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: My face can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: Yes you read it right. This foundation is not like your other heavy foundation but thats how i like it!. I barely use makeup because of my sensitive skin. When i started using PUR my skin feels better and not cakey. It looks very natural but effective in hiding small blemishes. If you have acne prone skin this might work for you since it wont clog your pores, but like i mentioned you might need concealer for hiding bigger blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: LifeGigabytes

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation and I've tried MANY over the years! Great coverage and I am 47 and have sensitive skin. Doesn't cake up in my fine lines and doesn't irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pressed mineral makeup for awhile as the one I had been using has been changed (formula) and even though face powder is not recommended for mature skin, find mineral powder will not settle into my wrinkles. Therefore I checked out Pur Minerals and looked at some the colors, and decided on Blush Medium. I find it easy to use and goes on very nicely. I thought since "Blush" was in the title, it would be a "pink" tone and to my eye, seems so. It is lightweight, but as with any powder, one can overdo. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: AstrogirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for over 40/sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm a former makeup artist and fairly picky about what I will use on my sensitive skin I ordered this when I couldn't get my usual shade online of a liquid foundation. I had big doubt about a powder being able to cover well. Big surprise-IT WORKS! I live in Florida so hot, humid weather and heavy makeup don't mix. I use a moisturizer with SPF30 daily and I like having this as an extra layer of protection. This is light as air, covers pretty well (I do use a primer underneath unless I am in a big hurry) and doesn't look caked on or too dry. I plan on a spare for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Florida

customer_reviews.title: Awful colors for pale skin
customer_reviews.text: The makeup is good and goes on smooth, but the colors for light/pale skin (porcelain and light) are just too pink. They should make one with a golden/yellow undertone. It's too bad, because I really like this powder. On their website it says that porcelain is for pale skin with yellow undertones, but no way. The powder is pink when you open it and goes on pinkish as well.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Went on dry and flakey, did not cover redness
customer_reviews.text: Went on super flakey and gross! Would not recommend. First picture shows how it was going on my face. The second picture is CoverGirl. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Price gouge
customer_reviews.text: Eight months ago this product was $17. The price has almost doubled. The product is good but not THAT good.
customer_reviews.author: Chia Z.

customer_reviews.title: In love with PUR
customer_reviews.text: I have been a bare minerals gal for 10 plus years until the product started to break me out. I went to Ulta for recommendations for new products. The sales lady offered Pur as a new alternative to bare minerals. Right off the bat I noticed the difference while she was applying the product. It was light and the coverage was flawless. The product stayed in place and no smearing. It lasted all day and super easy to remov. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle/Matt Runnels

customer_reviews.title: The old version used to be my holy grail. This new version is not impressive. I stopped buying.
customer_reviews.text: I love the original Pur Minerals 4-in-1 compact which has a small applicator at the back. It has been the only foundation I used for several years. Since they changed the packaging to this, I didn't like it. Not only is the package very unfriendly when applying on the go as there's no room to keep a sponge in the case, but the formula seems to be different too. It feels very dry on my face. I stopped buying it after a few more tries.
customer_reviews.author: CaLi

customer_reviews.title: Great matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Mineral Fusion pressed powder foundation but I had heard some good things about this product. I got a deal on it so decided to give it a try! I'm glad I did! The tan powder is a perfect color match now that I've gotten a little bit of sun. Does a fantastic job of keeping my skin matte, and with the help of a good primer and setting spray, it looks as good at 6pm as it did when I applied it at 9am. While Mineral Fusion has a much wider color range, and I'll continue to use because of that, I'm going to use PÜR Minerals as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nevets24

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great product! It was exactly what i was looking for. Something i can quickly throw on that is light, matches my skin perfectly, doesn't look cakey, and makes my skin look even and matte. The only cons (which weren't enough to lower my score) are that it doesn't have much coverage on its own, and it powdered a bit more than other higher priced products do when using foundation brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ofelia

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage. I'm 59 and am starting to get spots, wrinkles , uneven skin tone,etc. This is the first full coverage (in my price range) I've found!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Holt

customer_reviews.title: ... Pur Minerals 4-In-1 for several years and it's the best concealer/ all-over cover up for anything on your face- ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Pur Minerals 4-In-1 for several years and it's the best concealer/ all-over cover up for anything on your face- without magnifying wrinkles or crinkles or pores. I've tried other products and sent them back. This is the best powder I have ever found! Truly hides imperfections while looking very natural and not pancake-y!! BUT, recently, the company has changed the formula, and the original is no longer available...I want the original!! This 'new and improved' formula is NOT as good. Turned dry and didn't cover as well. Not happy...I want my old and unimproved Pur Minerals back! How can you improve on perfection? You can't!! Not a good decision, Pur Minerals Company...
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Oompa Loompa Orange
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation but this coloor is medium tan. It is dark and orange. Make sure to read which color because unless you're an oompa loompa, this color won't match your skin!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Good product; shoddy packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love Pür Minerals; however my compact was cracked! Fortunately I still had my previous compact and could transfer the foundation from the cracked one to the old one. Still, the foundation is already falling apart and will be more difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Works well with sensitive combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin that breaks out with anything. I don’t break out with this product. Also, I don’t like the feel of the liquid foundation on my skin. Love this! It feels like I have nothing on with good coverage. I do have to wait a while after moisturizer before applying or I will have issues with blotches. But if I wait, then no trouble. Works well with combination type skin.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love mineral makeup in general due to its natural products, its lightweight feel and above all its glowing results on my face. I just got this for the first time this week and I'm very happy with it. I use a kabuki brush to apply it to my face and I love the natural "glow" it gives my skin. Makes me look younger too and as if I just got out of a facial. It goes on evenly and blends evenly with my skin tone. Beautiful product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F.

customer_reviews.title: Compact arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the staples in my makeup supplies. First time I've ordered from here & was disappointed it arrived cracked. Nothing worse than a compact with no lid especially at the price you pay for this stuff. I know the product is good, this review is more to pinpoint the condition it arrived in.
customer_reviews.author: Shree

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite power. I have been using this as my foundation for 10 years! I’m 32 years old and the coverage is great but it also looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah David

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 8-14; 3 weeks ago. I have barely used it as I am retired so we go out maybe once a week, if that, due to Covid. I rarely put on make up at home if we are not going out. Yesterday we were meeting friends and I was shocked to see the beginning of an empty spot on the bottom of the “base” that holds this makeup! The “powdered make up” must be very thin. Will not be ordering this again because it is too costly, even though I was happy with the coverage, if it is going to not last for a very long period. I will go back to what I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Hixon

customer_reviews.title: Breakout central! And I’m not sensitive at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this powder, and I do love the coverage, it’s probably the best coverage n finish I’ve ever tried. However, I’m giving it a 1 because of the horrific breakouts I had from it. I NEVER breakout and I’m not sensitive whatsoever, but this did me in. Too bad cause the look was great but not worth the massive breakouts:(
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: my most important product
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to product. I don't use goopy foundations, just this miracle powder to lighten the ugly blackness under my eyes and take the shine off the face. As other people have mentioned the effect on the skin is wonderful. I rarely ever have breakouts anymore. I can't ever think of using a product other than this one. I used to use the MAC equivalent, but this is more reasonably priced and actually does more. If they ever stopped making this, I'd cry!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bouldin

customer_reviews.title: It’s fake!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fake! This is not PUR cosmetics!! The pan doesn’t even fit in the compact. The quality is horrible. I’ve worked in Ulta and have used this product before. It’s a fake
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this powder foundation, based on a recommendation from a dematologist's office, for my melasma and it works well to cover up the discoloration on my skin. I do put it over a foundation (from another brand) that I like to use also, and never have any issue with that regard either.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Porcelain
customer_reviews.text: Love!!!!!!!!!! Perfect natural look I was going for! Great coverage for a powder. Used with Laura Geller cream concealer under my eyes and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it for over ten years and love it. I usually get a slightly lighter shade ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not brand loyal to much of anything. Except Pur Minerals 4-in1 Pressed Powder. I have been using it for over ten years and love it. I usually get a slightly lighter shade for the winter and a slightly darker in the summer. It blends so easily. This is the makeup for all those like me who don't know how to properly apply makeup. It's hard to mess this up!
customer_reviews.author: James & Amy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: At First I Was Nervous...But...
customer_reviews.text: I am SO glad this item finally arrived! It felt like ages that I was waiting. I was loyal to one brand for 10+ years...one of the pioneers in making safe beauty, but my skin has changed over time and the previous brand I was wearing for 10+ years just wasn't working on my skin anymore. This is one of the best powder foundations I have ever used. My skin is very sensitive and I tend to break out easily so I also need a fuller coverage powder...this is the answer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MarkToMarket

customer_reviews.title: it's good coverage but darker than usual
customer_reviews.text: I like it and when I first bought this shade it worked really well, but I feel like the pigment has changed and it's now darker so it's a disappointment. My skin tone hasn't changed, so it's weird that the shade wouldn't match. I'd suggest buying 2 shades to figure out what color will work better for your skin tone, or go to Ulta to have your shade matched. It provides good coverage, but usually around 3pm I need to reapply to my T zone.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Lee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, acne prone, hormonal skin and this make-up is amazing. I’ve introduced it to a lot of my girlfriends, who now swear by this product too. You must use the primer first then powder! It can be a matte look or dewy, depending on the primer and moisturizer you use. Truly an amazing product that I’ve been using for 6 years since I started getting adult acne.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for oily/combination/sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin, and I've been looking forever for makeup that covers well without feeling heavy, and doesn't turn me into an oil stick an hour after I've applied it. This powder is perfect. I use it with the Pur primer and Balancing Act finishing powder. Great coverage, not heavy like liquid foundations, doesn't cake, doesn't cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Zen Bunny

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: nice color, goes on smooth, would keep.buying as long as they keep the formula
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight total coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and find this to be the best powder for me. It is lightweight and yet still covers and evens my skin. I do not wear anything besides powder, so for me having one that covers well without making me feel like I was wearing a ton of makeup was very important.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder and will never change
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder. I have only used this concealer for the past 4-6 years. It’s perfect for not looking like you have 10 layers of makeup. You don’t look fake with this powder but still covers perfectly. I will never change and have also converted some of my friends now and they wear nothing else bc of how natural and beautiful it makes you look.
customer_reviews.author: knord

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying this product. As soon as I opened it, the disc containing the powder fell into my hands. I’m very disappointed. I should have just tried harder to find the Japanese brand I have been using which is more than half of what this cost. I’ve had dollar store compacts that I have purchased for my kids Halloween makeup last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: The best mineral powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this through Costco a few years ago and since then, I have been in love with this product. I can't imagine my life without this makeup powder now. It's so easy to apply, super quick, you can control the coverage and the price has come down significantly since I first purchased it in Amazon(Costco no longer carries it)
customer_reviews.author: Mon K

customer_reviews.title: I love this mineral foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this mineral foundation. I have used it for the past few years and will continue to do so. It is easy to apply with a makeup brush, lightweight, and has great coverage. It covers most of my imperfections without having to use concealer. It sometimes requires reapplication later in the day, but overally, this is a great 4-in-1 foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Lightbody

customer_reviews.title: Even, flawless skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect balance of feeling like you are wearing nothing at all and medium-full coverage. I normally only wear makeup on special occasions, but now I’m starting to wear makeup more often. With liquid makeup I always see makeup strokes or blotches (maybe from a distance you can’t see it, but I can see it). With the Pur 4in1 press powder my skin looks even and flawless. Please note, I followed advice to go a shade darker than your skin color and it worked for me. I like it so much I started to wear it to work everyday. It evens out the skin and doesn’t look like I’m trying hard. Happy customer for life 😀
customer_reviews.author: Yanitz irizarry

customer_reviews.title: New formula is dry, looking for new brand :(
customer_reviews.text: Timely shipping but why did Pur have to change the formula. I loved this Pur 4in1 powder foundation and have it used it for years, sometimes I'll get lucky and recieve the older formula depending on where I buy which just reminds me how bad the new formula is. It sits on top of ur skin like cheap drugstore makeup does whereas it used to blend in and become ur skin with beautiful, flawless natural looking coverage. Looking for a new brand now thats more like the old Pur 4in1 formula but will keep using this in the meantime :(
customer_reviews.author: Lyza

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I requested a mineral foundation for mature skin. Unfortunately wrinkles were very defined after I used it.... I will need to continue seeking another product.
customer_reviews.author: B Stella Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this product for a long while now and pray it doesn’t get discontinued. I have very oily skin and have trouble finding liquid makeup that doesn’t look greasy 10 min after I apply it. I brush this stuff on over pretty much any liquid foundation and it not only keeps the grease at bay, but gives a smooth, airbrushed finish. People ask me all the time what I do to my skin to make it look like that and I tell them to buy this makeup. Not sure if they believe me, it’s that good
customer_reviews.author: C Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pressed powder for a couple of years now. One compact lasts me almost a whole year with light daily use. The powder is lightweight and doesn't go on thick and heavy. It looks very natural on. It might be on the light side of coverage - if you want something with heavy coverage it might not work for you. I love it though. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ZumaLun

customer_reviews.title: Great product but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder and have been using it for years. I have very sensitive skin and it has helped with my breakouts and covers blemishes incredibly well even by itself. The only reason I took away a star is that mine was poorly packaged and arrived cracked and it’s spilling out when I open it. I definitely recommend the product, but I won’t be buying it from Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Powder Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years after trying several different brands of powder and cream. This is the only that I feel gives me coverage without feeling like I've painted my face since I wear minimal make up in general. I would say I'm not sure the SPF does much, but I usually use a regular sunscreen when I remember anyway.
customer_reviews.author: slransde

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use mineral makeup
customer_reviews.text: I like this makeup to wear on my "non makeup days" if that makes sense. I have very pale skin with redness and this makeup helps to tone down the redness in my face and is super easy to brush on. When I put on a full face of makeup I use this more as a finishing powder. I do wish it covered more, but it may just be my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this purchase. I have been wearing this same powder for over 3 years. Not sure what happened with this batch but it’s flaky and it usually takes me 3 to 4 months to hit bottom of container. I’ve only had it barley a month and it’s alre gone. It should not be that way. It should last longer than 30 days. Especially when I only use it 2 to 3 days a week!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Buy if u want healthy powder but not for coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is merely a decent powder. It didn't cover like it said it would. Buy it if you want a healthy feeling powder but not for coverage. It cost too much for just powder & of course no applicator included. Pur company may want to rethink adding applicator cuz perhaps that's why it doesn't cover??
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Madison

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this powder foundation!! I have tried most and this is the best for wearing alone for a light application or for using over liquid foundation for a full face. It covers very well and stays flawless all day with little shine.
customer_reviews.author: H.AnconaFL

customer_reviews.title: The best for extremely oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely oily skin. I am rarely able to wear makeup because of it. This stuff actually sticks to me without oxidizing. I apply an oil control spf moisturizer then oil control primer and then the pur makeup with oil control setting spray over that, and I can get away with only blotting every 2 hours or so. That's impressive to me considering with even tarte I need to blot at least every half hour. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Black

customer_reviews.title: I get great compliments when using this makeup
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Exactly as described. Very natural looking and my skin can breath. I get great compliments when using this makeup. One concern... It had an expiration date 29 days after I received it. Mineral powder foundation doesn't usually grow bacteria as quickly as liquid foundation. Mineral powder foundation also has a longer shelf life once opened. But would have preferred a fresher batch.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup that I’ve been using for years. Love the deeper shade and that it has spf 15 sun protection. It is getting harder to find in brick and motor stores so I’m glad I can get it through amazon. Like the powder foundation better than the cream or liquid ones. Doesn’t feel as heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with powder in chunks
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but difficult to work with in chunks. Buying local seems to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pur Minerals 4-in-1 foundation is the best foundation I have used
customer_reviews.text: Pur Minerals 4-in-1 foundation is the best foundation I have used. I've been using this foundation for a few years now and will continue to do so. The blush medium is a bit darker than expected, but the coverage is great. It is lightweight and a little goes a long way. It comes with a pad for application, but I would recommend using a brush. Very high quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Lightbody

customer_reviews.title: Invisible! *wink wink*
customer_reviews.text: Best powder out there, hands down. I get a lot of compliments on my skin when I'm wearing this, little do they know that Pur does all the work. I've tried Pur's concealers as well and was not as impressed, so I use this with L'Oreal Paris True Match Super Blendable Concealer Crayon (for under-eye and acne) and no one can tell I'm wearing make up at all.
customer_reviews.author: N. Stough

customer_reviews.title: Check your product
customer_reviews.text: I received my make up compact today and this is the 5th time that I have ordered it. I am very disappointed because the inner portion side of the makeup was slight damaged. The inside of the part that contains the make up is moving around, not secure. So if I happen to accidentally open the compact while upside down all the contents will fallout, will need to return the product after waiting over a week to get! I have photos and a video.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a great mineral based foundation, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Pur 4 in 1 for many years and frequently receive compliments on my facial skin. It is easy to use with the chisel brush that came with my original set, takes less than a minute to apply if you follow the directions. Easily applied over the Pur Corrective toner for my skin's natural redness and lasts for hours. Also easy to wash off in the evening and gentle overall on the facial skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M. LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: Coverage; color
customer_reviews.text: Use to use nothing but liquid foundation ,until I discovered this.Really covers ,easy to apply and lasts all day. Great product! Thank You ,Judy Galligan The only reason for not giving 5 stars is that the actual makeup, is not adhered to the bottom of the compact itself.
customer_reviews.author: Judy From Yonkers

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite foundation! I used to use Bare Minerals foundation before, but once I tried this brand I was hooked. This makeup is almost $40 at Ulta, so the Amazon price is an incredible deal. I am only ordering it online from now online.
customer_reviews.author: Grascen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Pur minerals pressed powder for about 7-8 years or so. I normally buy golden medium but blush medium works for me too when I'm not as tan in the winter. Plus it was cheaper than the golden medium for some reason. Great price here on Amazon! A little goes a long way for me.
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup! I have been using it for 8 years! Good coverage, lightweight and doesn’t make me break out. I usually buy from Ulta on their once a year sale, but amazon gets it to you quick when I run out
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great powder for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This powder offers really good coverage. I love how it feels on my skin and only needs to be touched up once or twice in a 12 hour day. I have very oily skin and happen to live in a humid environment. I switched from Bare Minerals and have found a great alternative with PUR plus their mascara is phenomenal too!
customer_reviews.author: phantomco

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Boxycharm has made me fall in love with Pur. When I ran out of foundation I knew I didn't want to get Tarte again so I began my search. I love this powder foundation. It has a super smooth application and looks very natural. Plus it smells good!
customer_reviews.author: KJCD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: nice make up, doesn't feel like it's on and has a nice shimmer to it however it was hard for me (someone with Puerto Rican brown completion) to get the right shade. it was a touch to light for me so i gave it to my sister and now waiting for the next shade darker to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough coverage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while staying at home, but still wanting to look somewhat put together. It doesn't really help that much. Too little coverage. More of a powder than a foundation effect.
customer_reviews.author: N. King

customer_reviews.title: This is a great great powder foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is a great great powder foundation. My only complaint is that it was darker than the picture but in all fairness buying the right shade (unless it's your normal brand) is difficult to do online. This is the reason it still gets 5 stars. This powder was 27 dollars at Sephora and only 17 with tax on Amazon and it's worth that and then some. Gives you a flawless finish without being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amcloud711

customer_reviews.title: Broke out instantly
customer_reviews.text: Broke out instantly. Have tried it 3 times and every time I go to wash my face I have 2-3 new pimples from the powder clogging my pores.
customer_reviews.author: EAKennedy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. Provides coverage but still looks natural. My local Ulta stopped carrying it, so I’m glad I can find it on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: kellyzimmer0109

customer_reviews.title: I love the PUR minerals pressed 4 in 1 powder
customer_reviews.text: I love the PUR minerals pressed 4 in 1 powder. I put it on in the morning with my concealer and it lasts all day. The shade I chose was darker than I expected. I have very fair skin so it is noticeably dark. It is light and doesn't look or feel cakey as some makeup does.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this brand. For being an African American woman the color matching is perfect. Not thick and great for sensitive skin. Was so excited to see at such a low price. This is a five star brand.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing....but
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products you love to hate. I find it hard to put on correctly and get the coverage I really want. My only other experince with a powder mineral foundation was an Avon product and I loved it. I would not buy this again, but for me it's just a personal preference. I want something fast that makes my face look great. This just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Great for you skin...
customer_reviews.text: This is a staple. I added it to my repertoire once adult acne and changes in my skin appeared in my mid-thirties. Great product which is kind to the skin. Vegan too! Try it. It does cover well when used alone. I use lotion on my face, concealer under my eyes and then this on top. I do use the PUR Chisel brush to apply. Worth the money to me!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: One stop solution
customer_reviews.text: I have rosecea. I can’t stand putting all kinds of products on my skin that hides it but also makes it worse in the long run. This product is light weight, goes on easy, and covers all the things you want it to. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jane O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Pur works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very pale, sensitive skin with some hormonal acne. This powder is the only powder that I have found that does not cause itchiness after several hours. It provides nice, even coverage and hides the redness from my acne. Such a good product. Tip, I apply it with a makeup brush not a sponge or puff.
customer_reviews.author: ANNIE

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: So, I go through makeup quickly and am always looking for the best. I have spent top dollar on cosmetics. I was paying $50.00 for pressed powder when I came across this gem. As good as the expensive brands. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: What's all the hype about?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I don't know what all the hype is about this product it's like many other pressed powders the coverage was not above and beyond, however it is not bad either but I would not pay that price again.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have very oily skin so prefer a powder foundation. This Pur Minerals makeup is the best I have ever found. When I put it on, it looks so natural, I am told they can't tell it's make-up. It just makes my face/skin look flawless. Other powder makeup I've tried either didn't cover enough, or was too thick and cakey. Put over my SPF, it's easy to apply and lasts a long time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cozy Mystery Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pur Minerals pressed powder
customer_reviews.text: Love the pressed powder. I switched from a loose powder and I'm so glad I found Pur Minerals. So much easier and less messy for travel. Good coverage, but with oily tending skin or activity I do reapply. Great natural match for my skin tone. Good solid compact, decent amount for the price, wish there were a little more in there as loose powder seems to go farther. No irritation for this sensitive skin. Invest in the best brush you can find (you're worth it) and what a difference THAT makes, as does a really good brush cleaner. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sail2it

customer_reviews.title: Chemical known to cause cancer: Silica
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. Probably the best foundation makeup powder I've used. After a fellow review (1 star), the customer's complaint had to do with a new formula. Well, I have the answer to why they reformulated the product. After looking for the product elsewhere, I found this product contains Silica which is a chemical known to cause cancer. In the review about product possibly changing, she explains that the product has changed because the labels are a different color? Not too sure if this is accurate. I am curious to know if PUR MINERALS is still using "Silica" in this foundation. I will look into this further before purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pressed powder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product being a pressed powder with a little sunblock in it. The color matches my skin tone and goes on smoothly. Not chalky or that dry look to the skin. It comes in different tones for fair or dark skin. I highly recommend this product, good for those who prefers not to have a shiny looking face.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Patzelt

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good powder foundation. I'm not sure if this is supposed to be a foundation though. Coverage is light, I still have to use concealer on my spots, but this powder goes over it beautifully. It also seems to help control oil.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Power broke in pieces after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product normally. I have never had an issue with the powder itself until this last time. In fact, it usually lasts a good 4--5 months. After 3 weeks of use, the powder broke into several unusable pieces. I contacted PUR corporate about my issue, and due to the fact that I did not order it directly from their 'website', they could not help me. I am extremely frustrated with the company PUR. It is a hassle to go through the return process with Amazon, plus there is not option for either 'product not up to expectations' or 'other'.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best foundation I've ever used. I got a sample in the ipsy bag, so I decided to purchase a full size. 120% worth the price. It lasts such a long time. The coverage is awesome seems very weightless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PÜR 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Makeup with Skincare
product_meta.description:
Color:Light| Size:0.28 OunceOur 4-in-1 Pressed Mineral Powder Foundation gives you the flawless mineral coverage you expect from PÜR with groundbreaking skincare ingredients built into our award-winning formula. Our powder foundation is adored worldwide for its lightweight feel and no-mess, no-stress application. This all-in-one foundation, concealer, powder and SPF 15 has been clinically proven to correct, prevent and interrupt your biggest skin concerns – even after the makeup comes off! That's pretty smart beauty. Active ingredients - titanium dioxide 17.0 % inactive: mica, bismuth oxychloride, caprylic/capric triglyceride, boron nitride, zinc stearate, magnesium silicate, sodium starch octenylsuccinate, mannitol, sodium gluconate, citric acid, sodium citrate, waltheria indica leaf extract, dextrin, ferulic acid, lactic acid (l), butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, retinol, ceramide ap, silica, tocopheryl acetate, aqua, glucosamine hci, pisum sativum (pea) extract, bambusa vulgaris leaf/stem extract, magnesium carbonate, iron oxides.

BRAND STORY
At PÜR, we believe that innovative beauty shouldn't be a burden on anyone. That's why we've been committed to creating cruelty-free products from the start. All of our makeup and skincare products are free of animal testing.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
